no_root: Kada ka gudanar da wannan shirin kamar root!
use_sudo: Yi amfani da sudo lokacin da ake bukata.
internet_error: Kuskure: Babu haɗin intanet da aka gano!
timeshift_missing: Timeshift ba a shigar da shi. Babu snapshot da aka yi.
packages_count: Adadin packages da za a sabunta: %d
packages_list: Jerin packages da za a sabunta:
no_packages: Babu packages da za a sabunta
install_error: Kuskure a shigar da sabuntawar packages
removing_obsolete: Ana cire packages da suka tsufa...
snap_error: Kuskure a sabunta packages na Snap
flatpak_error: Kuskure a sabunta packages na Flatpak
reboot_message: Ana bukatar sake kunna don kammala sabuntawa.
reboot_prompt: Kana so ka sake kunna yanzu? (y/N):
reboot_later: Kada ka manta sake kunna daga baya!
help_description: uubu - Kayan aikin sabuntawa mai sarrafa kansa don Ubuntu/Kubuntu
help_desc_long:
uubu (Update Upgrade Ubuntu) yana sarrafa cikakken sabuntawar system.
Yana sabunta APT, Snap, Flatpak, yana tsaftace system kuma yana ba da zaɓin sake kunna idan akwai bukata.
help_example_1: # Cikakken sabuntawa na yau da kullun
help_example_2: # Sabuntawa tare da snapshot na Timeshift
flag_snapshot: Yi snapshot na Timeshift kafin sabuntawa
flag_no_snap: Kada ka sabunta packages na Snap
flag_no_flatpak: Kada ka sabunta packages na Flatpak
flag_no_reboot: Kada ka tambayi game da sake kunna
flag_dist_upgrade: Yi cikakken sabuntawa na tsarin (ya hada da cire kunshin da suka tsufa)
upgrade: Ana duba sabuntawan kunshin da ke akwai...
